workshoptitle: Column Mapping and Purging Data in Oracle GoldenGate Veridata

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab provides an introduction of Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Create Datasource Connections
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps to create datasource connections.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Create Groups and Compare Pairs
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps to create groups and compare pairs.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Create and Execute Jobs
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps to create Jobs and execute them.

tutorials.title: Lab 7:  Add and Remove Mappings
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps to add and remove mappings in Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.

tutorials.title: Lab 8:  Purge Data and Delete Directories
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the Purge Data and Delete Directories features in Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.
